data.title: Weather in Moscow in february: Temperature, Rainfall, Sunshine... for February 2025! - Russia
data.meta_description: Is the climate in Moscow (in Russia) in february good? Discover the weather forecast in february 2025 to prepare your trip.
data.text:
Moscow in february: average Weather, Temperature and Climate

Best time to go to Moscow?

Weather in Moscow in february 2025

The weather in Moscow in february comes from statistical datas on the last years. You can view the weather statistics for all the month, but also navigating through the tabs for the beginning, the middle and the end of the month.

Evolution of daily average temperature and precipitation in Moscow in february

These charts show the evolution of average minimum/maximum temperatures as well as average daily precipitation volume in Moscow in february.

The climate of Moscow in february is very bad

the weather in Moscow in february is rather dry (with 64mm of rainfall over 4 days). The weather is worst than the previous month since in january there is an average of 67mm of rainfall over 4 days.

The climate is quite cold in this location this month. Plan to cover you well! The thermometer averaged maximum of -4°C. The seasonal minimum is -8°C. Thus, the mean temperature average in february in Moscow is -6°C. Note that these seasonal averages are in contrast with those observed in Moscow in february with a maximum record of 3°C in 2014 and a minimum record of -29°C in 2012.

In february in Moscow, the days on average last 09:40. Sunrise is at 07:54 and sets at 17:34.

Weather data for Moscow in february:

Weather data for Moscow for february are derived from an average of the weather forecast since 2009 in Moscow. There is a margin of error and these forecasts are to be considered as general information only. The weather in Moscow can vary slightly from year to year, but this data should limit surprises. So you can pack your bags or check for the best time in year to go to Moscow.
